name: Baobab (Guchara, Wotan, BogdanRaven)
description:
Cut, dig and uproot the baobabs until they destroy the planet.

Controls:

"←" or "A" - go left

"→" or "D" - go right

"SPACE" - do something

"1", "2", "3" - upgrade equipment

Credits:

Drobynko Dmytro - developer (https://wotan16.itch.io)

Masliy Bogdan - developer (https://bogdanraven.itch.io/)

Zakhotii Anton - artist

Zadvernyuk Artem - animator, composer

Huk-Sataikin Oleh - game designer (https://guchara.itch.io)

Soundtrack "Novo" - Rage Zone (https://www.youtube.com/@RageZoneMusic/featured)
